main_text.sentence: In some studies corticosteroids are not very effective inhibitors of cysteinyl leukotriene pathways, at least when assessed by their inability to reduce cysteinyl leukotriene concentrations [91,92] and thus combination of these therapeutic classes may offer some benefit.
C3a also induces robust mast cell degranulation [38,39] and leukotriene C4 generation (Thangam, B and Ali, H, unpublished data).
The ability of allergen to cross-link high affinity IgE receptors (FcÎµRI) on mast cells to induce degranulation and leukotriene generation is well documented [35,36].

Other genes which encode proteins like Leukotrien-B4 receptor (LTB4R), Leukotrien-A4 hydrolase, IL-8 receptor (IL-8RA), anaphylatoxin C3a receptor-1 (C3aR1), Neutrophil Cytosolic Factor 1 (NCF 1), S100 calcium binding protein A9, Defensin, (DEFA 1/4), LPS binding protein CAP18 (CAMP), and Peptidoglycan Recognition Protein (PGLYRP) are involved in chemotaxis, inflammatory reaction and superoxide metabolism [26].

In addition, arachidonic acid is the precursor of eicosanoids, prostanoids, leukotrienes and lipoxins, which may mediate further activation [24] and PLA2-induced hydrolysis of ether lipids gives rise to paf-acether [25].
